DOC.brief_summary: This study assess impact lymphaticovenous microanastomosis volume reduction postmastectomy upper extremity lymphedema . We hypothesize multiple lymphaticovenous micro-anastomosis distal arm result reduction volume improvement quality life patient post-mastectomy lymphedema
DOC.brief_title: A Pilot Study Assessing Effect Lymphaticovenous Micro-Anastomosis Treatment Postmastectomy Lymphedema
DOC.criteria: Subject 1870 year age Subject Stage IIIV unilateral lymphedema Subject le 6 month completion cancer treatment Subject allergic reaction lymphatic contrast agent ( Indocyanine Blue ) Subject medically unfit procedure Subject unable complete followup visit Women positive urine pregnancy test exclude study ; woman childbearing potential ( define undergone hysterectomy postmenopausal least 24 consecutive month ) must agree refrain breast feed practice adequate contraception specify informed consent . Adequate contraception consist oral contraceptive , implantable contraceptive , injectable contraceptive , double barrier method , abstinence . Subject bilateral lymphedema
